name: Match cards to train memory skills!
name_original: Match cards to train memory skills!
description:
If your kid loves cars and boys stuff he will also like this Match cards game designed especially for boys!

Memory is a skill we all use everyday and the stronger the better. Matching cards games like this one make it easy for kids to improve their short-term memory, concentration and speed recognition skills. Kids love practicing their memory skills while playing fun games like this classic memory.
Rule of the game is simple - reveal two cards at one time to match pairs of the same image. To achieve the highest score, you should match pairs of cards fast and with the fewest mistakes.

Features:
√ nine levels of difficulty (from 2 to 18 pairs of cards)
√ name of revealed pair is read out loud in english or polish language– it’s great first step into learning the language
√ amazing original graphics
√ kids friendly interface
√ different themes of cards designed for kids especially boys

Matching cards will encourage your child to train concentration and memory with pleasure.
Download this entertaining and educational game made especially for your kid!
